${ModID}:DividedFury.NAME: Divided Fury
${ModID}:DividedFury.DESCRIPTION: When you ${ModID}:rip, an Attack card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL When you ${ModID}:rip, a Skill card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:ViciousCycle.NAME: Vicious Cycle
${ModID}:ViciousCycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal an additional !D! damage for each card *ripped this turn.

${ModID}:ViciousCycleText.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal an additional !D! damage for each card *ripped this turn.

${ModID}:ArtAttack.NAME: Art Attack
${ModID}:ArtAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The ${ModID}:Art Card causes the target to lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:SurprisePack.NAME: Surprise Pack
${ModID}:SurprisePack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When *ripped, NL gain [E] [E].

${ModID}:Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
${ModID}:Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the number of ${ModID}:Art Cards in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Inspiration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the number of ${ModID}:Art Cards in your exhaust pile.

${ModID}:InspirationText.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the number of ${ModID}:Art Cards in your exhaust pile.

${ModID}:FragileShrug.NAME: Fragile Shrug
${ModID}:FragileShrug.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL When *ripped, draw !M! card.

${ModID}:HazardousStrike.NAME: Hazardous Strike
${ModID}:HazardousStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL When *ripped, exhaust !M! cards at random.

${ModID}:TotalWeakness.NAME: Total Weakness
${ModID}:TotalWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TotalWeaknessText.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LeftBrain.NAME: Left Brain
${ModID}:LeftBrain.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Art cards in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:LeftBrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unnate. NL Exhaust all Art cards in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile. NL Exhaust.
